CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Opportunity__r.Tender_Date__c), Opportunity__r.Opportunity_ID__c & " - " & Supplier__r.Name & " - " & Site_Address_Email_Template__c , TEXT(Opportunity__r.Tender_Date__c) & " " & Opportunity__r.Opportunity_ID__c & " - " & Supplier__r.Name & " - " & Site_Address_Email_Template__c)
CustomField.label: NZ Quote Request - Email Subject
